data.description: About Us: HiveWatch is a tech-forward, inclusive organization fostering the evolution of the physical security industry. We are a diverse team of forward thinkers who empower each other to find creative and collaborative solutions in an industry ripe for modernization. We are passionate about the problems we’re solving for our customers and equally passionate about the company we’re building. HiveWatch is here to help security teams pivot from chasing threats to preventing them. We protect organizations, people, and property through the intelligent orchestration of physical security programs. With better communication, more insights, and less “noise”, we are modernizing what it means for businesses and their employees to truly feel safe.POSITION OVERVIEW: HiveWatch is seeking a detail-oriented AI Data Labeling Intern to join our team and play a critical role in improving our AI products. This position involves reviewing input data, evaluating AI-generated analyses, and validating the accuracy of automated assessments. The successful candidate will spend their time ensuring the quality and precision of our AI models through meticulous data labeling and validation processes. Location: In-office (El Segundo) Duration: 6 months with potential to extend WHAT YOU'LL DO: Data Analysis & Validation: Review and label various data inputs to HiveWatch AI products and assess corresponding AI-generated analyses for accuracy and completeness Quality Assurance: Validate AI predictions against ground truth labels, identifying false positives, false negatives, and edge cases Dataset Management: Structure and organize large and advanced labeled datasets using both advanced Excel/Google Sheets functionality and AWS or in-product tooling Reporting: Prepare and present daily summary reports on data labeling progress, quality metrics, and key findings Documentation: Maintain detailed records of labeling decisions, methodology, and any observed patterns or issues Collaboration: Work closely with AI/ML teams to provide feedback on model performance and suggest improvements MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS: Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a relevant degree program (Computer Science, Data Science, Criminal Justice, or related field) Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets, including: Advanced formulas and functions Data visualization and charting Pivot tables and data analysis tools Conditional formatting and data validation Excellent attention to detail and ability to maintain focus during repetitive tasks Strong analytical and critical thinking skills Ability to work independently and manage time effectively Clear written and verbal communication skills Strict adherence to information security policies PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS: Basic SQL experience for database queries and data extraction Previous experience with data annotation, labeling, or quality assurance roles Familiarity with security systems, surveillance technology, or video analysis Understanding of machine learning concepts and AI model evaluation Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, etc.) Background in statistics or data analysis Interest in computer vision and AI applications WHAT YOU'LL GAIN Hands-on experience with AI/ML model training and evaluation processes Professional experience in data analysis and quality assurance methodologies Exposure to cutting-edge security technology and industry practices Mentorship from experienced AI and security professionals Potential for extended or full-time employment consideration WORK ENVIRONMENT In-office position - collaboration and training require on-site presence Fast-paced startup environment with opportunities for learning and growth Access to state-of-the-art technology and security analysis tools Supportive team environment focused on innovation and excellence ADDITIONAL INFO: Hourly range for this position: $18 - $30 an hour. *Final offer will be at the company's sole discretion and determined by multiple factors, including years and depth of relevant experience and expertise, location, and other business considerations. At HiveWatch, you are encouraged to challenge the status quo, provide your unique point of view, and leave fear at the (access controlled) door. OUR EEO STATEMENT: HiveWatch is an equal opportunity employer and we are committed to cultivating a work environment that supports, inspires, and respects all individuals. We execute our hiring practices so that they are merit-based and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, marital status, age, disability, medical condition, genetic information, national origin, ancestry, military or veteran status, or other protected characteristic.
requirements: Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a relevant degree program (Computer Science, Data Science, Criminal Justice, or related field)
Basic SQL experience for database queries and data extraction
Previous experience with data annotation, labeling, or quality assurance roles
Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, etc.)
Hands-on experience with AI/ML model training and evaluation processes
Professional experience in data analysis and quality assurance methodologies
Mentorship from experienced AI and security professionals
